name: Three Knights
description:
This is a Match-3 game centered around how efficient you are with your moves; the objective is to match as many tiles as you can within a move limit. I created this as part of a collaboration with Anthogynist from Github.

There are two boards in the game, and four types of tile-swaps: Adjacent, Knight, Interboard, and Gravity Control.

More information can be found in the howToPlay.txt file included with the game build, which can be found here: 

https://github.com/CG-Tespy/ThreeKnights/releases/tag/V1.00

Anthogynist's page: https://github.com/Anthogonyst
